backend.medicalservice.Messages.services

Interface MessageService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageServiceImpl

    public interface MessageService
    Service interface for managing messages within the application. This interface defines methods to send and receive messages and obtain information about message queues.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Integer getQueueSize(java.lang.String Queue)
      Retrieves the size of a specified queue.
      java.lang.String recieveMessage(java.lang.String QUEUE)
      Receives a message from a specified queue.
      boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String messageContent, java.lang.String QUEUE)
      Sends a message to a specified queue.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String messageContent,
                    java.lang.String QUEUE)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Sends a message to a specified queue.
        Parameters:
        messageContent - The content of the message to be sent.
        QUEUE - The name of the queue to which the message should be sent.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the message was successfully sent.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during message sending.
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if a timeout occurs during the operation.

      • recieveMessage

        java.lang.String recieveMessage(java.lang.String QUEUE)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Receives a message from a specified queue.
        Parameters:
        QUEUE - The name of the queue from which to receive the message.
        Returns:
        The content of the received message.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during message receiving.
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if a timeout occurs during the operation.

      • getQueueSize

        java.lang.Integer getQueueSize(java.lang.String Queue)
        Retrieves the size of a specified queue.
        Parameters:
        Queue - The name of the queue for which to retrieve the size.
        Returns:
        The current size of the specified queue.
